Codes

*131#

Check airtime

by MTN Rwanda & Airtel Rwanda

Dial

*903#

Check account balance, transfer funds and so much more

by Access Bank Rwanda

Dial

*909#

Local government services, tourism services and Police services

by Irembo

Dial

*555#

Pay taxes and access RRA services

by Rwanda Revenue Authority
